subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: With the addition of the freshman point guard sensation Derrick Rose and the evolution of the junior guard Chris Douglas-Roberts, Memphis has lived up to Coach Joah Calipari’s optimism.
snippet: With the addition of the freshman point guard sensation Derrick Rose and the evolution of the junior guard Chris Douglas-Roberts, Memphis has lived up to Coach Joah Calipari’s optimism.
